item.title: Running Ghost on Cloud Foundry
item.description: At work, we often create blogs for our projects so that we can easily share out progress, and more importantly show people pretty pictures of our progress. Often we will use a public blog service like tumblr to create a password protected blog, which is convenient and probably the right way to go. Occasionally we will work with a client who cannot or will not use a public service like tumblr and so we need another way.
